acorn_grove_0.intro: You wake up in an acorn grove, seemingly smaller than usual.

intro_squirrel.name: Eckard
intro_squirrel.attack: You try to throw a punch, but you realize you're a squirrel
intro_squirrel.interact: "Hello fellow squirrel ... Wait! You're not supposed to be a squirrel! You need to get to the demetamorphinator! I think Gottfried knows where it is. Ask him!"
intro_squirrel.inspect: Eckard's large bushy tail sways in the ever so acorn grove wind, catching colorless squirrel weather intuitions.

portal_squirrel.name: Gottfried
portal_squirrel.attack: You try to throw a punch, but you realize you're a squirrel.
portal_squirrel.interact: "Curious Curious Curious ... You're looking for the 'demetamorphinator?' Just follow me!" You follow Gottfried into the hollow of a tree, but just as you cross the threshold, you stumble over your squirrel claws and fall into a gaping chasm ...
portal_squirrel.inspect: Gottfried's matted and unruly fur is knotted in ways that would puzzle the most dedicated of knot theorists.

room_storey_i_0.name: Lobby
room_storey_i_0.introduce: *Crash!* You land on a sofa in the University of South Carolina M Bert Storey Research and Innovation Center Lobby! The lights have not yet begun to quit their work, but it still seems like there's something you're failing to acknowledge about this room.

intro_joe.name: THE Joe Hardy
intro_joe.introduce: You see the comparatively enormous stature of Joe Hardy leaning against a wall.
intro_joe.attack: You try to scratch Joe, but he kicks you back.
intro_joe.interact: "Oh shoot, you can talk? Anyway, I'm assuming you want to get through that door. The first thing you'll need is a sunflower seed butter and hummus sandwich."
intro_joe.inspect: Joe's hair contains hints of green so slight they might be mere references to the past.

sans_sandwich_joe.name: STILL Joe Hardy
sans_sandwich_joe.introduce: "Nice to see you again but where's the sandwich?"
sans_sandwich_joe.attack: You try to kick Joe, but he dodges and says, "Hey! I thought we were friends."
sans_sandwich_joe.interact: Joe appears angry: "How dare you come back without the sandwich?". Then he adds, "That's okay, but what else do you have in your inventory?"

sandwich_joe.name: STILL Joe Hardy
sandwich_joe.introduce: You spot a manic Joe Hardy yearning for food.
sandwich_joe.attack: Joe aggressively attacks you before you were able to strike a hit.
sandwich_joe.interact: You hand over the sunflower seed butter and hummus sandwich to Joe. He says: "(munches) Thanks for the sandwich, but if you look closely (munches again), the door was open all along."

elephant_in_the_room.interact: Take this sealed, food-safe jar of sunflower seed butter
elephant_in_the_room.attack: **The elephant will no longer give you sunflower seed butter**
elephant_in_the_room.inspect: It seems like nobody else in the room can see the elephant...

security.name: Security Bread
security.introduce: You bump into a security guard roaming around the floor.
security.attack: You try to punch the security, but he manhandles you to the ground and handcuffs you. **He had the right bread but you choose violence instead.**
security.interact: "What are you doing here? You need something? I got some leftover bread if you want." **Security hands over the right bread.**
security.inspect: The security sends comms on his walkie-talkie.

janitor_almanac.name: Dusty Old Almanac
janitor_almanac.introduce: You find an extremely rusty, beat up almanac laying in the janitor's closet.
janitor_almanac.attack: You tear up the pages, leaving pieces scattered around.
janitor_almanac.interact: **You perform a binary search. Finding the right page rewards the left bread.**

trash_can.name: Trash Can
trash_can.introduce: You see the only available trash can on the 1st floor.
trash_can.attack: You knock over the trash can, revealing a sealed, clean, food-safe hummus.
trash_can.inspect: Flies circulate around the trash bin.

first_door.name: Transport Door
first_door.introduce: You figured it out! The door was open all along.
first_door.interact: Transport is a success! Onto the next floor.
first_door.inspect: The glowing door has a surprise behind it.
